hooks.name: task-start-notification
hooks.description: 任务创建时发送声音通知
hooks.prompt: 执行通知脚本: {{.rootDir}}/.claude/plugins/sound-hooks/scripts/notify.sh '任务开始: {{.subject}}' 'task_start' '{{.rootDir}}/.claude/plugins/sound-hooks/config.json'
